## Overview
### 1.
__Euclidean.dist__ is a function which can be used for computing the distance between \code{x} and \code{y}.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
Euclidean.dist <- function(x, y) }{
  sqrt(sum((x-y)^2))
}
```


### 2.
__Euclidean.norm__ is a function used to compute the $L_2$ norm of a vector.
source code as follows:
```{r}
Euclidean.norm <- function(x) {
  sqrt(sum(x^2))
}
```
